text:
Home2 Suites by Hilton opens first property in Arkansas Published on : Saturday, July 11, 2015
Home2 Suites by Hilton, Hilton Worldwide’s award-winning mid-tier, all-suite hotel brand designed for modern business travelers and extended stay guests, announced today the opening of Home2 Suites by Hilton Little Rock West. The new property will bring 93 new suites to the greater Little Rock market and is the brand’s first property in the state.
“Offering guests a modern take on the extended-stay model, Home2 Suites is ideal for the traveler visiting the Arkansas state capital who wants the comforts and conveniences of home, but is looking for a value-driven price point,” said Bill Duncan, global head of Homewood and Home2 Suites by Hilton. “With modern suite accommodations that feature a unique “Working Wall”, movable furniture, and a work/media area, guests will have the chance to customize their stay to better suit their needs.”
Owned by Shackleford Crossings Properties, LLC, Home2 Suites Little Rock West is part of the city’s ongoing hospitality sector growth. In the past year, three properties have opened and an additional three more are slated to open by 2016, according to the Little Rock Convention and Visitors Bureau.
Located at 2710 South Shackleford Road, Home2 Suites Little Rock West is conveniently situated just off I-430, I-630, and I-30, making downtown Little Rock, Little Rock Airport and all five of the area hospitals a quick ride away. Guests can also discover popular restaurants, pubs and shops at the nearby Shackleford Crossings, within walking distance of the hotel.
Home2 Suites Little Rock West offers easy access to technology and inviting community spaces, as well as the trademark Home2 Suites amenities, such as the Oasis lobby, the Home2 MKT for grab-and-go items, the Spin2 Cycle, a combined laundry and fitness area and complimentary continental breakfast at the Inspired Table that includes a variety of morning favorites such as cereals, hot artisan breakfast sandwiches, waffles, yogurt and more. The hotel features an indoor swimming pool for guests to use. All Home2 Suites properties are also pet-friendly.
Home2 Suites Little Rock West participates in Hilton HHonors®, the only hotel loyalty program that allows members to earn Points & Miles® on the same stay and No Blackout Dates on reward stays. HHonors members always get our lowest price with our Best Price Guarantee, along with HHonors Points, digital check-in and no booking fees only when they book directly through Hilton.
